rules.summary: KL University has strict academic, conduct, hostel, and institutional rules that students must follow.

academic_conduct.attendance: A minimum of 85% attendance is mandatory for all courses to be eligible for semester-end examinations.
academic_conduct.evaluation: In-semester evaluations contribute a maximum of 50% to the total marks.
academic_conduct.integrity: Students must maintain academic integrity and avoid malpractice in examinations.

code_of_conduct.discipline: Strict silence and discipline must be maintained in classrooms and laboratories.
code_of_conduct.prohibited: Ragging, smoking, alcohol consumption, and indiscipline are strictly prohibited.
code_of_conduct.dress_code: Students must follow the prescribed uniform and official dress code.

fees.summary: KL University fee structure varies based on program and campus.
fees.btech: B.Tech (4 years) fees range from ₹10.96 Lakhs to ₹12.16 Lakhs depending on specialization.
fees.mba: MBA fees range from ₹4.5 Lakhs to ₹10 Lakhs depending on specialization.
fees.other_ug: Other undergraduate programs range from ₹6.46 Lakhs to ₹12.16 Lakhs.
fees.hostel_fees: Hostel fees range from ₹80,000 to ₹1.8 Lakhs annually.
payment_procedure: Login to ERP portal using student credentials.
Select semester and verify the payable amount.
Choose payment method (Net Banking / UPI / Card).

exams: Examination Pattern: Internal marks 60% and External marks 40%. Students must maintain minimum attendance eligibility to write semester-end exams.
admissions: Admissions are conducted through KLEEE / KCET and other national entrance exams. Students must apply online through the admissions portal and complete document verification.
attendance_info: Minimum 85% attendance is mandatory for all courses to be eligible for semester-end examinations.
administration: Administrative office handles admissions, certificates, fee records, hostel allotment, and academic documentation. Students can contact administration through official portal.

scholarships.merit_based: Scholarships are provided based on academic performance.
scholarships.marks_based: Students with Intermediate marks >= 90% are eligible for fee reduction.
scholarships.sports: Sports scholarships are available for state and national level achievers.
scholarships.need_based: Financial assistance is available for economically weaker students.

process: Apply online through official admissions portal.
Appear for KLCET or accepted entrance exam.

campus_safety.cctv: CCTV surveillance across academic and hostel areas.
campus_safety.anti_ragging: Strict anti-ragging policy with disciplinary action.

library.timings: Central Library Timings: 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM.
library.books: Students can borrow up to 4 books at a time.

lms.description: Learning Management System used for course materials, assignments, quizzes, and internal assessments.
upload_rules: Faculty must upload lecture notes before scheduled class.
Assignments must be uploaded in PDF format.
File size should not exceed 20 MB.
Students must submit assignments before deadline.

academic_portal.description: Academic portal used for attendance, marks entry, course registration, and results.
upload_rules: Internal marks must be uploaded before exam deadline.
Attendance percentage must be updated regularly.
Marks once submitted require administrative approval for modification.
All entries must be verified before final submission.
